getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.content: Welcome to Super Wings Simulator! In this game, you play as a dispatcher at World Airport, sending Super Wings characters to help children around the world. The basic flow is: View Mission → Select Character → Dispatch → Complete Mission → Earn Rewards.
getting_started.content_zh: 歡迎來到 Super Wings 模擬器！在這個遊戲中，你將扮演世界機場的調度員，派遣 Super Wings 角色去幫助世界各地的小朋友。
steps: Check available missions on the mission board
Select the most suitable character based on mission type
Confirm dispatch and watch the character take off
Wait for mission completion and collect rewards
tips: Each character has their own specialty - choosing the right one increases success rate
Watch character energy levels - tired characters need rest

character_selection.title: Character Selection Guide
character_selection.content: Choosing the right character is key to mission success! Each Super Wings character has unique specialties and abilities. For example: Jett excels at delivery, Flip at sports missions, Donnie at construction, and Todd at digging.
character_selection.content_zh: 選擇正確的角色是任務成功的關鍵！每個 Super Wings 角色都有獨特的專長和能力。
steps: Check the mission type (delivery, sports, construction, etc.)
Match character specialty to mission type
Verify character is available and has enough energy
Confirm dispatch
tips: Matching specialty gives 10% success rate bonus
When unsure, Jett is always a versatile choice

mission_types.title: Mission Types Guide
mission_types.content: There are multiple mission types in the game, each requiring different skills to complete. Understanding mission types helps you make better dispatch decisions.
mission_types.content_zh: 遊戲中有多種任務類型，每種任務都需要不同的技能來完成。

delivery.name: Delivery Mission
delivery.description: Deliver packages or items to destinations on time

sports.name: Sports Mission
sports.description: Assist with sports competitions or athletic events

police.name: Police Mission
police.description: Maintain safety or assist with order

energy_system.title: Energy System
energy_system.content: Each character has an energy value that depletes when completing missions. When energy falls below 30%, mission success rate decreases by 20%. Let characters rest to restore energy.
energy_system.content_zh: 每個角色都有能量值，執行任務會消耗能量。能量低於 30% 時，任務成功率會降低 20%。
steps: Check character energy before dispatch
Low energy characters should rest
Energy partially restores after mission completion
Use repair kits for quick energy restoration
tips: Don't let character energy drop to 0
Rotating different characters keeps the team active

leveling_up.title: Leveling System
leveling_up.content: Completing missions earns experience points. Accumulate enough experience to level up. After leveling, character speed and reliability improve, and max energy increases.
leveling_up.content_zh: 完成任務可以獲得經驗值，累積足夠經驗就能升級。升級後角色的速度和可靠性都會提升。
steps: Complete missions to earn experience
Auto-level when experience threshold reached
Stats improve automatically on level up
Unlock new abilities and appearances
tips: Higher difficulty missions give more experience
Specialty-matched missions also give bonus experience

resources_management.title: Resource Management
resources_management.content: The game has multiple resources to manage: money for purchasing items, fuel for dispatching missions, repair kits to restore character energy, and boost packs to instantly complete missions.
resources_management.content_zh: 遊戲中有多種資源需要管理：金錢、燃料、修理包和加速包。

money.name: Money
money.description: Earned from missions, used for items and unlocking characters
money.tips: Higher difficulty missions give better rewards

fuel.name: Fuel
fuel.description: Required for dispatching, auto-regenerates every minute
fuel.tips: Fuel replenishes automatically, don't worry too much

boost_packs.name: Boost Packs
boost_packs.tips: Save for emergency or time-limited missions

transformation.title: Transformation System
transformation.content: Super Wings characters can transform from plane mode to robot mode! After transforming, they can use special abilities to solve problems. Each character's transformation has unique capabilities.
transformation.content_zh: Super Wings 角色可以從飛機形態變身成機器人形態！變身後能夠使用特殊能力來解決問題。
steps: Character arrives at mission destination
Encounters a problem to solve
Calls out transformation phrase
Uses robot form's special abilities
tips: Each character has different transformation abilities

events_handling.title: Random Event Handling
events_handling.content: During missions, you may encounter random events like weather changes, encounters, or obstacles. Making the right choice can earn rewards or avoid losses.
events_handling.content_zh: 任務途中可能會遇到隨機事件，如天氣變化、偶遇或障礙物。做出正確的選擇可以獲得獎勵。

event_types.weather: Weather events - may need to change route or wait
event_types.encounter: Encounter events - can choose to interact or continue
event_types.obstacle: Obstacle events - need to find a solution
event_types.bonus: Bonus events - opportunity for extra benefits

tips: Don't rush decisions, read options carefully
Some events require specific character abilities for best outcomes

jett.name: Jett
jett.guide_content: Jett is the protagonist of Super Wings, a red high-speed jet. He's enthusiastic, helpful, and the best choice for delivery missions. Jett has top speed and high reliability, making him the recommended character for beginners.
jett.guide_content_zh: Jett 是 Super Wings 的主角，紅色的快速噴射機。他熱情、樂於助人，是配送任務的最佳人選。
jett.tips: Jett is versatile and can handle any mission, but excels at delivery tasks.

flip.name: Flip
flip.guide_content: Flip is a red plane with white stripes, wearing a blue cap. He's full of energy and loves sports, making him the best choice for all sports-related missions.
flip.guide_content_zh: Flip 是紅色配白色條紋的運動型飛機，戴著藍色帽子。他充滿活力，熱愛運動。
flip.tips: For soccer matches, sports events - Flip is your go-to character!

donnie.name: Donnie
donnie.guide_content: Donnie is a yellow and blue mechanical expert who excels with all kinds of tools. Any mission requiring repair, construction, or mechanical work is his forte.
donnie.guide_content_zh: Donnie 是黃藍配色的機械專家，擅長使用各種工具。
donnie.tips: Equipment broken? Donnie has everything in his toolbox!

todd.name: Todd
todd.guide_content: Todd is a brown drill plane wearing a yellow safety helmet. He's a digging expert - any mission requiring excavation, drilling, or underground work is no problem for him.
todd.guide_content_zh: Todd 是褐色的鑽頭飛機，戴著黃色安全帽。他是挖掘專家。
todd.tips: Archaeological expeditions, tunnel digging - Todd is your best choice.

paul.name: Paul
paul.guide_content: Paul is a blue and white police plane equipped with sirens and lights. He's disciplined and an expert at handling safety and order-related missions.
paul.guide_content_zh: Paul 是藍白配色的警察飛機，配有警笛和警燈。他紀律嚴明。
paul.tips: When safety needs to be maintained or emergencies handled, Paul is the most reliable choice.

bello.name: Bello
bello.guide_content: Bello is a black and white zebra-striped plane and an animal expert. He has special affinity with animals, and any animal-related mission is his specialty.
bello.guide_content_zh: Bello 是黑白斑馬條紋的飛機，是動物專家。
bello.tips: For animal rescue or wildlife protection missions, Bello can communicate with animals!

jerome.name: Jerome
jerome.guide_content: Jerome is a blue fighter jet, experienced and wise. He's the team's senior member, excelling at complex missions requiring experience and judgment.
jerome.guide_content_zh: Jerome 是藍色的戰鬥機型飛機，經驗豐富且充滿智慧。
jerome.tips: For complex or judgment-requiring missions, consider sending Jerome.

chase.name: Chase
chase.guide_content: Chase is a dark blue plane with red lightning stripes, a special agent. He has unique shape-shifting abilities, able to transform into various vehicles, perfect for missions requiring diverse capabilities.
chase.guide_content_zh: Chase 是深藍色帶紅色閃電條紋的特工飛機。他有獨特的變形能力。
chase.tips: When different vehicles like cars or boats are needed, Chase can transform to handle it!

beginner_tips: Beginners should start with simple delivery missions
Jett is the easiest character to master
Don't forget to let tired characters rest
intermediate_tips: Learn to match characters to mission types
Keep resources stocked for emergency missions
Complete daily challenges for extra rewards
Collect different characters for various missions
advanced_tips: Use boost packs wisely for time-limited missions
Balance usage of all characters for even leveling
Challenge high-difficulty missions for rare rewards
